00021 #ifndef __VECTOR_H_
00022 #define __VECTOR_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Debug.nxc"
00025 #include "Matrix.nxc"
00026 
00043 struct Vector
00044 {
00045     long x;         
00046     long y;         
00047     long theta;     
00048 };
00049 
00054 long VectorGet(Vector &a, int i)
00055 {
00056     if (i == 0) return a.x;
00057     if (i == 1) return a.y;
00058     return a.theta;
00059 }
00060 
00065 void VectorSet(Vector &a, int i, long value)
00066 {
00067     if (i == 0) a.x = value;
00068     if (i == 1) a.y = value;
00069     a.theta = value;
00070 }
00071 
00076 long VectorGetDistance(Vector &a)
00077 {
00078     long distance = (a.x * a.x) + (a.y * a.y);
00079     distance = Sqrt(distance);
00080     return distance;
00081 }
00082 
00088 int VectorGetAngle(Vector &a)
00089 {
00090     long distance = VectorGetDistance(a);
00091     long distanceRatio = ((a.x * 100)/distance);
00092     int angle = Acos(distanceRatio);
00093     if (angle > 0 && a.y < 0) angle = 360 - angle;
00094     return angle;
00095 }
00096 
00100 long VectorGetDistanceVec(Vector &a, Vector &b)
00101 {
00102     long distance = (a.x - b.x) * (a.x - b.x) + (a.y - b.y) * (a.y - b.y);
00103     distance = Sqrt(distance);
00104     return distance;
00105 }
00106 
00110 long VectorGetAngleVec(Vector &a, Vector &b)
00111 {
00112     long distance = VectorGetDistanceVec(a, b);
00113     long distanceRatio = (((b.x - a.x) * 100)/distance);
00114     int angle = Acos(distanceRatio);
00115     if (angle > 0 && (b.y - a.y) < 0) angle = 360 - angle;
00116     return angle;
00117 }
00118 
00122 void VectorInit(Vector &a, long x, long y, long theta)
00123 {
00124     a.x = x;
00125     a.y = y;
00126     a.theta = theta;
00127 }
00128 
00137 void VectorInitPolar(Vector &a, long distance, int angle, int theta)
00138 {
00139     a.x = (distance * Cos(angle))/100;
00140     a.y = (distance * Sin(angle))/100;
00141     a.theta = theta;
00142 }
00143 
00150 void VectorInitBound(Vector &retVec, long x, long y)
00151 {
00152     retVec.x = x;
00153     retVec.y = y;
00154     retVec.theta = VectorGetAngle(retVec);
00155 }
00156 
00163 void VectorTranslate(Vector &a, long distance, int angle)
00164 {
00165     a.x = a.x + ((distance * Cos(angle))/100);
00166     a.y = a.y + ((distance * Sin(angle))/100);
00167 }
00168 
00172 void VectorAdd(Vector &a, Vector &b)
00173 {
00174     a.x += b.x;
00175     a.y += b.y;
00176     a.theta += b.theta;
00177 }
00178 
00182 void VectorSubtract(Vector &a, Vector &b)
00183 {
00184     a.x -= b.x;
00185     a.y -= b.y;
00186     a.theta -= b.theta;
00187 }
00188 
00192 void VectorScale(Vector &a, long S)
00193 {
00194     a.x *= S;
00195     a.y *= S;
00196 }
00197 
00201 void VectorReduce(Vector &a, long S)
00202 {
00203     a.x /= S;
00204     a.y /= S;
00205 }
00206 
00211 void VectorRotate(Vector &vec, long theta)
00212 {
00213     long newX = (vec.x * Cos(theta) - vec.y * Sin(theta))/100;
00214     long newY = (vec.x * Sin(theta) + vec.y * Cos(theta))/100;
00215     vec.x = newX;
00216     vec.y = newY;
00217 }
00218 
00224 void VectorRotateAtPoint(Vector &vec, long theta, long pivotX, long pivotY)
00225 {
00226     vec.x -= pivotX;
00227     vec.y -= pivotY;
00228     long newX = (vec.x * Cos(theta) - vec.y * Sin(theta))/100;
00229     long newY = (vec.x * Sin(theta) + vec.y * Cos(theta))/100;
00230     vec.x = newX + pivotX;
00231     vec.y = newY + pivotY;
00232 }
00233 
00240 void VectorTransform(Vector &vec, Matrix &matrix, Vector &retVec)
00241 {
00242     ASSERT(matrix.rows == 3 && matrix.cols == 3,
00243            "Transformation matrix is not 3x3");
00244     
00245     retVec.x =     MatrixGet(matrix, 0, 0) * vec.x +
00246                    MatrixGet(matrix, 0, 1) * vec.y +
00247                    MatrixGet(matrix, 0, 2) * vec.theta;
00248     retVec.y =     MatrixGet(matrix, 1, 0) * vec.x +
00249                    MatrixGet(matrix, 1, 1) * vec.y +
00250                    MatrixGet(matrix, 1, 2) * vec.theta;
00251     retVec.theta = MatrixGet(matrix, 2, 0) * vec.x +
00252                    MatrixGet(matrix, 2, 1) * vec.y +
00253                    MatrixGet(matrix, 2, 2) * vec.theta;
00254 }
00255 
00256 void VectorPrint(Vector &vec, string name, int waitPeriod)
00257 {
00258     TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, name, true);
00259     NumOut(0, LCD_LINE2, vec.x, false);
00260     NumOut(0, LCD_LINE3, vec.y, false);
00261     NumOut(0, LCD_LINE4, vec.theta, false);
00262     Wait(waitPeriod);
00263 }
00264 
00265 #endif /* __VECTOR_H_ */
